local\_commutativity: Every 2D face spanned by any pair (A,B) of operators must commute in normal form.
global\_normal\_form: There exists a unique NF\_nHYP for any expression built from the chosen operators and meta-operators.
embedding: Lower-dimensional slices (Tri-Unity, Tri-Unity+Î¼, etc.) must embed consistently into NF\_nHYP.
